name: Footy Kit Designer
description:
A shirt-designing game for AGBIC2020.

Please leave a comment with suggestions for this game!

This was made hastily in a month between my new online classes. It was really fun to work on in the background between (and oftentimes during) my classes.

The original famicase entry: Created by Steve Propst "Enter the exciting world of football (soccer) fashion. Design amazing looking kits for the pitch and the street."

Thanks for checking out Footy Kit Designer!
